p0.name: Talent Digital Development Co., Ltd, Fujian

p0.detail: I have won one provincial/national English competition during my university years, and am able to use English as my working language.

p1.detail: I'd like to accept and evaluate the feasibility of new things, not practicing empiricism or dogmatism, but gaining truth through practice.

p2.brief: [Experience] Well practiced ability of building fluent, SEO friendly and stable web apps
p2.detail: 2 years of dedicated experience both in Vue/Nuxt development.

p3.brief: [Experience] Well practiced ability of building RESTful api services
p3.detail: 2 years of Java (8+) & {experience} years of NET Core (8.0+) dedicated experience for building RESTful api services.

p4.brief: [Tech] Well practiced ability of building distributed system according to requirements
p4.detail: Service registration and discovery, remote calling, distributed job, traffic throttling, scheduled tasks, distributed locks, message queues, caching, etc.

p5.brief: [Tech] Possess relevant knowledge of the universal mechanism of databases
p5.detail: Transactions, session, locks, indexes, shard, slaves.

p6.brief: [Tech] Well practiced ability of ORM frameworks

p7.brief: [Tech] Containers are widely applied across my projects
p7.detail: Possess relevant knowledge of containers, and being able to write Dockerfiles and Docker-compose.yaml according to requirements to manage containers.

p8.detail: 8 hours+ sleep is required for my energy-consuming brain to ponder & sustain peaceful mood & write clean code. Good for healthy as well.
